Elle exerce avec succès son activité qui lui procure des revenus pour la contribution des charges familiales. Elle cliente de FECECAV depuis 3 ans et a bénéficié de 3 crédits qu'elle payé avec succès. Avec le présent crédit Maman voudrait renforcer son fonds de roulement afin d'acrroître son stock pour la satisfaction de sa clientèle

loans.use: Purchase of yams in neighboring villages to resell them in Assahoun

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline A. is a dynamic and ambitious 37-year-old woman. She is married and has 4 children. She lives with her family in Sassandra on the south east Atlantic coast of Cote d'Ivoire. Her husband is a fisherman in the Sassandra region.

Pauline sells various local foods such as cassava, couscous, and banana paste in her little cafe with an open space where factory workers take their lunch every day. This business has allowed Pauline to contribute significantly to the household and education expenses of her family.

Pauline is also an active member of the cooperative of tradeswomen of Sassandra. She has benefited from AE&I's microcredit program since 2005 and has been an excellent performer. She will use this loan to expand her business.

loans.use: to expand her little cafe serving factory workers

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis is 45 years old, married and the father of 2 children. His entire family depends on his business located in the Laureles Norte neighborhood where he sells a variety of basic food products. Luis would like to purchase foodstuffs and perishable goods to be able to offer them to his clients and thus expand his business a little.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

El Señor Luis tiene 45 años, casado, con 2 hijos. Toda la familia subsiste por medio del negocio en el cual vende productos varios de consumo diario, ubicado en el barrio Laureles Norte. Don Luis desea comprar productos alimenticios y perecederos para odertarles a sus clientes y así poder expandir un poco el negocio.

loans.use:
Purchase of foodstuffs and perishable items for sale.

Comprar productos alimenticios y perecederos para su venta

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
Maria C. is a merchant. She has a site in the bustling Managua market where she sells breakfast. She began construction on several bedrooms in her house, but due to a lack of funds, she has not been able to finish them. She needs to finish the construction because her house is getting too small for the six family members that live with her.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

Maria C. es comerciante. Tiene un local en un populoso mercado de Managua, se dedica a la venta de desayunos. Empezó la construcción de unos cuartos de habitación en su vivienda, pero debido a la falta de dinero no los ha podido finalizar, tiene la necesidad de terminar esta construcción porque su casa se está volviendo muy pequeña para los 6 familiares que viven con ella.

loans.use:
Finish bedroom construction

Finzalizar la construcción de cuartos de habitación

loans.name: Cruz Adilia

texts.es:
Ms. Cruz is married, the mother of two, and sells clothing, footwear and natural beverages in her home. She currently needs to improve the roof over her house so that her children can live without the risk of getting sick from the dampness.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

Doña Cruz, casada, con 2 hijos es una pequeña comerciante de venta de ropa y zapatos y de refrescos naturales en su casa de habitación. Actualmente necesita mejorar el techo de su casa para que sus hijos habiten sin riesgos de enfermedades por la humedad.

loans.use:
Change her kitchen roof

Cambiar techo de su cocina

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia O. is Nicaraguan, 53 years old, married and has one child. She supports her family with her grocery store and video game rental business in the Laureles Norte neighborhood. At the moment, her house does not have any doors separating the bedrooms and would thus like to purchase them to divide the rooms. She would thus be able to improve the quality of life and the home's presentation for her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

Julia O. es Nicaraguense, tiene 53 años, casada, con 1 hijo. Ella tiene una pulpería y un negocio de alquiler de video juegos en el barrio Laureles Norte, con los cuales sostiene a su familia. Actualmente su vivienda no cuenta con puertas de separación en ninguno de los cuartos de habitación por lo que requiere comprar puertas para así poder separarlos e ir mejorando la calidad de vida y mejorar también la presentación a sus clientes.

loans.use:
Purchase bedroom doors for her home.

Compra de Puertas para los cuartos de habitación de su vivienda

loans.name: Marta Cecilia

texts.es:
Marta Cecilia is 35 years old, widowed and the mother of two children. As her family's sole financial provider, she owns a grocery store in the Laureles Norte neighborhood where she sells a variety of products. Her business has been growing little by little and she earns enough to cover the education, healthcare and household costs. She is requesting a loan to purchase more products and to increase the already existing inventory. She would then be able to provide a better service to her customers and improve the family's income and her children's quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

Marta Cecilia tiene 35 años, viuda y con 2 hijos. Siendo el único sostén de su familia posee una pulpería con variedad de productos en el barrio Laureles Norte, la cual ha ido creciendo poco a poco y la que le genera los ingresos para la educación, salud y gastos del hogar. Solicita su crédito para compra de productos y ampliar la mercadería existente, y de esta manera dar una mejor atención a los clientes y mejorar los ingresos de la familia para dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.

loans.use:
Purchase of products for her business

Compra de Productos para su negocio

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa Argentina is an enterprising woman who, 30 years ago, used savings to start her business, selling fresh bread on the streets of Leon, Nicaragua. Because her customer base was growing rapidly and because she was a single mother with a growing son, she decided to rent a stand at the La Terminal market. She began selling soft drinks, water and, little by little, other refreshments and even telephone cards.

Thanks to the persistence and dedication of this exemplary woman, her business has grown with the help of CEPRODEL's loans. She now has a record 24 loans; the current loan is for a new project to improve her house and her business.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Rosa Argentina es una mujer esforzada y emprendedora que a partir de sus ahorros inició su negocio hace 30 años vendiendo pan fresco por las calles de la ciudad de LEÓN. Como su clientela crecia rapidamente y además por la necesidad de mantener a su hijo por ser madre soltera,necesita brindandole alimentacion, ropa y estudios, se decidió a alquilar un local al aire libre dentro del mercado LA TERMINAL. Empezó vendiendo gaseosas, agua y poco a poco algo de refrescos hasta la venta de tarjetas telefónicas.

Gracias a la perseverancia y dedicación de esta mujer ejemplar, su negocio ha crecido con la ayuda de los Créditos otorgados por CEPRODEL. Actualmente ella tiene un record de 24 créditos y el que pide actualmente es para su nuevo proyecto de mejorar la infraestructra de su casa y su negocio.

loans.use: Buy materials for improving residence.

loans.name: Mario De La Cruz

texts.es:
Mario resides in the modest Laureles Sur neighborhood and sells scrap metal. Currently his home does not have flooring due to his lack of money. He is requesting the loan in order to install a floor in his house and thus avoid the problems and illnesses that the dirt floor causes for his family.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

Don Mario habita en el humilde barrio Laureles Sur y es vendedor de desperdicios metálicos, actualmente su vivienda no cuenta con piso debido a la falta de dinero, solicita el crédito para ponerle piso a su vivienda y así evitar los problemas que trae el piso de tierra y que le provocan enfermedades a su familia

loans.use:
Purchase of bricks for the living room in his small home.

Comprar ladrillos para la sala de su pequeña vivienda

loans.name: Roberta

texts.es:
We find Roberta, a young and talented mother, making novel decorations of miniature animals out of sheep´s wool. She does this work with extreme patience and creativity. Owing to the large number of requests for her work, she would like to obtain a loan to invest in the purchase of wool, so that she can continue knitting a greater variety of miniature decorations and fulfill the requests. With the economic benefit that she'll obtain after selling her goods, she hopes to provide well-being, tranquility and security to her small 7-year-old son Omar and to her hard-working husband, Faustino, who is a construction foreman. With your help, Roberta´s family will be able to improve their quality of life in a short time.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer.

Encontramos a Roberta, madre joven y talentosa realizando novedosos adornos de animalitos en miniatura, basados en lana de oveja; oficio que desempeña con suma paciencia y creatividad; debido a la gran cantidad de pedidos que tienen sus novedosos trabajos desea obtener un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de lana a fin seguir tejiendo gran variedad de adornos en miniatura y así cumplir con las solicitudes. Con los beneficios económicos que obtenga luego de su comercialización desea ofrecerles bienestar, tranquilidad y seguridad a su pequeño hijo Omar de siete años y a su esforzado esposo Faustino, quien se desempeña como maestro de obras. Con tu ayuda la familia de Roberta, podría incrementar su calidad de vida en corto tiempo.

loans.use: Purchase of greater quantity and variety of wool.

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
This is Benedicta and her eight-year-old son William. Three months ago, with the support of her husband, Benedicta decided to buy a weaving machine and began her craftwork; she weaved beautiful children's jumpers, thanks to her talent to create different styles and in a variety of colours. There has been a great interest in her excellent work, which has been very well received.This is why she is appealing for your help and requesting a loan which she hopes to invest in the purchase of raw materials (wool) in order to increase the variety of her products and in order to weave a greater number of jumpers, pullovers, trousers, for both children and adults. Benedicta promises to repay the loan within six months. She and her family are hopeful that they will receive your unselfish help. Support them, they are counting on your help.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva Volunteer.

Ella es doña Benedicta y su pequeño hijo William de ocho años de edad, hace tres meses con apoyo de su esposo, decidió comprar una máquina de tejer y empezó ha incursionar en el trabajo artesano; teje hermosas chompas para niños, gracias a su ingenio para elaborar diferentes modelos y por la variedad de colores su excelente trabajo esta teniendo gran acogida y mucha solicitud, es por esa razón que recurre a tu ayuda y solicita un préstamo que pretende invertirlo en la compra de materia prima (lana) para ampliar la variedad de mercadería y tejer mayor cantidad de chompas, chalecos, pantalones, para niños y adultos, Benedicta promete reintegrar el préstamo en un lapso de seis meses.Ella y su familia están esperanzadas en recibir tu ayuda desinteresada, apóyalos, ellos esperan por ti.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials (wool)

loans.name: Zayda Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ms. Zayda is a single mother with 3 children in school. She currently owns a a small basic-goods store and supports her family with what she earns. She needs the money to invest in her business and thus offer a greater quantity of products to the families that shop there daily.

Translated from Spanish by Joanne Egnatchik, Kiva volunteer

Doña Zayda es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar. Actualmente posee un pequeño negocio de ventas de productos básicos con el cual mantiene a sus hijos. Ella necesita el dinero par invertirlo en su negocio y así ofertar una mayor cantidad de productos a las familias que la visitan diariamente.

loans.use:
Increase her store's inventory

Incrementar el inventario de su negocio

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, whose main qualities are her politeness and determination to develop, is a committed and cheerful mother. For the past seven years she has been selling pumpkin juice with apples, on a small tricycle which her husband, Zenón, adapted for the sale of her juices. These juices are an appetising and nutricious product in this area of the country. Elizabeth begins the daily preparation of her nutricious nectars at 2am, in order to then sell her product in the Main Square of her small town, Macari. She wishes to purchase another tricycle and thus increase her sales area for the greater convenience of her busy customers. In addition to this task, Elizabeth and her husband dedicate their time to caring for their three small cows, work which they carry out with great care and dedication which means they will achieve favourable results. The loan which Elizabeth has requested will be invested in another tricycle and the purchase of a small calf, and with these two investments her family's economic situation will be improved further still.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva translator

Su cortesía y empeño por progresar son las características principales de doña Elizabeth, madre empeñosa y alegre que desde hace siete años se dedica a la venta de jugo de quinua con manzana, en un pequeño triciclo que su esposo, Zenón, adecuó para la venta de sus jugos, producto muy apetitoso y nutritivo en esta zona de su país.Elizabeth empieza la preparación diaria de sus nutritivos néctares a partir de las 2:00 de la mañana, para luego venderlas en la plaza de armas de su pequeño pueblito, Macari. Tiene el deseo de comprar otro triciclo y así ampliar su puesto de venta para mayor comodidad de su concurrida clientela; adicionalmente a esta labor, Elizabeth y su esposo, se dedican al cuidado de sus tres vaquitas, faena que desempeñan con sumo cariño y dedicación y gracias al cual van obteniendo resultados favorables.La solicitud que hace doña Elizabeth los invertirá en adquirir otro triciclo y comprar otra becerrita, y con estas dos inversiones busca mejorar aún más su situación económica familiar.

loans.use: To purchase a tricycle and a small calf.

loans.name: Nemesia

texts.es:
In the square of the small town of Macará you will find a very cheerful and enthusiastic lady called Nemesia, who is 57 years old. Here she sells her delicious stews to customers and neighbours, work which she has dedicated more than thirty years to. While she carries out this honest job, her husband Julio is a building foreman and between the two of them, with much effort and sacrifice, they have been able to proviD. their four children with a higher education. This hard-working mother's wish is to now finish working and pass her professional career onto her youngest child Héctor. She can then feel great priD. and happiness in seeing her five professional children with promising futures. In order to make her wish more feasible, Nemesia wants to obtain a loan in order to invest in the purchase of greater quantities of wholesale products, so that she can, in some way, economize the preparation of her delicous stews. She promises to repay the loan within six months. Let's support this hard-working mother so that she can realise her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva Translator

En la plaza del pueblito D. Macará, encontramos muy contenta y entusiasta a doña Nemesia, D. 57 años D. edad, vendiendo sus deliciosos potajes a sus clientes y vecinos, labor a la que se viene dedicando hace más D. treinta años; mientras ella desempeña este noble oficio su esposo, Julio, trabaja como maestro D. obras y entre los dos con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio pudieron brindarles estudios superiores a sus cuatro hijos.El deseo D. esta laboriosa madre es terminar D. ofrecerle su carrera profesional a Héctor, su hijo menor, y así sentirse muy orgullosa y dichosa al observar a sus cinco hijos profesionales con un futuro prometedor.Para que su deseo sea más factible desea obtener un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra D. mayor cantidad D. insumos al por mayor, para D. alguna manera economizar en la preparación D. sus deliciosos guisos, así mismo promete reembolsar el préstamo en un lapso D. seis meses. Apoyemos a esta madre laboriosa a concretar sus planes.

loans.use: To purchase greater quantities of products for the preparation of her delicious stews.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
Jose is the vigorous father of two children. Seven years ago he decided to grow a family with Agustina, his wife, and ever since he works arduously and untiringly as a building worker. Additionally, he also decided to breed pigs in a little space of his humble home. After feeding them and taking care of them, he sells them once they have reached a certain size.

Now, he would like to ask for your help in order to get a loan to buy a “salchipapas” (typical Peruvian food with potatoes and sausages) car, a new business he would like to start with his wife, in order to offer wellbeing and security to his lovely kids.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

José, es un vigoroso padre de dos niños, hace siete años decidió formar su familia junto a Agustina, su esposa, desde entonces trabaja ardua e incansablemente en su labor de maestro de obras (albañilería), adicionalmente a este esforzado oficio, decidió criar en un pequeño espacio de su humilde domicilio cerditos, que luego del cuidado y alimentación que les brinda comercializa cuando estos alcanzan un considerable tamaño.

En esta oportunidad recurre a tu solidario apoyo y hace la petición de un préstamo a fin de comprar un carrito salchipapero, nuevo negocio que pretende poner con su amada esposa, y así ofrecerles bienestar y seguridad a sus adorables hijos.

loans.use: To buy a little car to sell “salchipapas” (typical Peruvian food with potatoes and sausages)

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa Maria started on her own, ten years ago, with the hope of bettering herself and earning enough to provide for her everyday needs. She came to our institution two years ago hoping to increase her income, having then 10 loans and demonstrating a consistent record of responsibility and business growth.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Rosa maria incio hace diez años con esfuerzo propio todo con el deseo de superarse para poder sostener sus necesidades personales, con el deseo de incrementar sus ingresos visito nuestra institucion hace dos años teniendo a la fecha 10 creditos en los cuales a demostrado siempre responabilidad y crecimiento en su negocio.

loans.use: Purchase various products for resale, including water, soft drinks, fruit, disposible dishes and glasses, etc.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosita, as she is fondly known to her friends and customers, decided approximately a year ago to open her small grocery store in her house, which she built with much effort and sacrifice and with the help of her husband Valentín, who is a primary school techer in a humble little school in his birthtown of Macarí. At first, this small business did not meet the family expenses, but as stock and variety within the store increased, her little shop became too small to meet the needs of her many customers. This is why this determined mother of two wants to increase her business in order to provide convenience and ease for her customers. Rosita eagerly awaits your selfless support.

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva Translator

Doña Rosita, como cariñosamente la suelen llamar sus amigos y clientes, hace aproximadamente un año decidió abrir su bodeguita en casa, la cual a costa de mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio construyó con ayuda de su esposo, Valentín, quien es profesor de educación primaria en una humilde escuelita de su pueblo natal, Macarí.En un principio, este pequeño negocio no le permitía solventar los gastos familiares, pero conforme aumentaba el stock y la variedad de mercadería su reducida tiendita fue quedando muy pequeña para atender a su concurrida clientela, es por esa razón que esta voluntariosa madre de dos niños desea ampliar su local para brindarles comodidad y bienestar a sus clientes.Rosita espera ansiosa por tu apoyo desinteresado.

loans.use: Expansion of a small grocery store

loans.name: Zenón

texts.es:
The prairie and the forage have traditionally been the main food sources for the cows of Zenón and thanks to the love and care that he gives to each one of his prolific cows, they have been able to reproduce fast and they give him a considerable amount of milk, which he sells for the production of cheese and butter.

Since Don Zenón was little, he felt a special affection and a vocation to become a livestock farmer. Now, it is thanks to this noble profession, in which he would like to further develop, that he can offer his wife and son economic stability.

To materialize his projects, he would like to get a loan and buy another cow in order to genetically improve his cattle and produce more milk.

Zenón thanks you in advance for your generosity; your help will certainly allow him to achieve his project.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

La pradera y el forraje han sido tradicionalmente el recurso alimenticio principal para las vaquitas de don Zenón, quien gracias al cariño y cuidado que brinda a cada una de sus generosas vaquitas van reproduciéndose rápidamente y le brindan a diario una considerable cantidad de leche, que comercializa para la elaboración de quesos y mantequillas.

Don Zenón, desde pequeño siempre sintió especial cariño y vocación por el trabajo ganadero, gracias a esta noble labor con la que pretende seguir prosperando, le ofrece a su esposa e hijo estabilidad económica.

Para concretar sus planes desea obtener un préstamo que tiene planeado utilizarlo en la compra de otra vaca y así mejorar genéticamente sus ganados para la producción de más leche.

Zenón agradece anticipadamente tu generosidad para llevar acabo su proyecto.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es:
We met doña Rebeca, who is 35 years old, at her humble home working hard taking care of her little groceries shop, she opens her shop on Sundays and during the holidays of her hometown of Macari.

From Monday to Saturday she takes care of her 8 cows, which thanks to her efforts and healthy feeding, produce 20 litters of milk per day. She is then able to sell the milk for the production of cheese, butter, yoghurts and other dairy products.

Doña Rebeca’s wish is to buy more products to replenish her little groceries shop and to buy one more veal to sell more milk, this will allow her to give a better quality of life and education to her 3 younger sons.

Thanks to you kind help, Rebeca will be able to succeed in her projects.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer.

Encontramos a doña Rebeca de 35 años de edad, en su humilde domicilio atendiendo afanosamente su tiendita de abarrotes, ella abre su pequeño establecimiento, sólo los domingos, días de feria de su pueblo natal Macari; de lunes a sábado se dedica al cuidado y protección de sus ocho vaquitas, gracias a la generosidad y a la buena alimentación de estos animalitos le permite acopiar todos los días veinte litros de leche, que los comercializa para la fabricación de queso, mantequilla, yogurt y demás derivados.

El deseo de doña Rebeca es comprar mercadería para llenar el stock de su tiendita y sobre todo anhela adquirir una ternerita más para llenar su establo y así con la comercialización de leche generar mayor ingreso económico para ofrecerles satisfacción y educación a sus tres menores hijos.

Con el apoyo de vuestro generoso corazón, Rebeca podrá tener éxito en su labor.

loans.use: To buy more products for her groceries shop and to buy one veal for the production of dairy products

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth is a nimble, persevering, and creative mother of four. Since her mother passed away, more than 25 years ago, she has worked making wallets, necklaces, and earrings together with her sister Flor, to then sell them during days of fair in her town, Macari, and nearby towns. She hopes to expand her market with a greater variety of models and sizes, and to achieve this she requests a loan, which after your generous contribution, she intends to invest in buying raw materials with the goal of creating her ingenious products. The financial benefits she will obtain, together with the immense motherly love she feels, will allow her to offer her children a better quality of life. Elizabeth is committed to pay back the loan in a period of 6 months. She anxiously awaits your support.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer.

Elizabeth, es una ágil, empeñosa y creativa madre de cuatro hijos; desde que su madre falleció hace más de 25 años se dedicó junto a su hermana Flor a la confección de carteras, collares y aretes, para luego comercializarlos los días de feria de su ciudad, Macarí y pueblos limítrofes. Tiene el anhelo de expandir su mercado para eso desea mejorar su trabajo con gran variedad de modelos y tamaños y para concretar sus planes solicita un préstamo que después de tu generoso aporte pretende invertir en la compra de materia prima a fin de seguir elaborando sus ingeniosas mercaderías, con los beneficios económicos que obtenga, y con el inmenso amor de madre que siente esto le permitirá ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.Elizabeth se compromete a retornar el préstamo en un lapso de seis meses, ella espera ansiosa tu apoyo.

loans.use: Buying raw materials (Compra de materia prima.)

loans.name: Cleofe

texts.es:
Cleofe is 49 years old. Since she was very young, she was always a hardworking and optimist woman. She works selling drinks and gifts, merchandise she offers at all the weddings in her hometown, Macari. Thanks to her effort and initiative, for the past two years this work has given her very favorable results, allowing her to improve the financial situation of her family. While she does this job, her husband, Leonardo, offers services of rural transportation from Macara to Ayaviri, in the little bus they bought through much effort. Between the two of them they seek to offer security and education to their five young children. Cleofe wants to increase her merchandise stock, and to make this work, she needs a loan. Let's help make Cleofe's plans become reality, she awaits your positive response.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer.

Cleofe de 49 años de edad, desde muy pequeña siempre fue una mujer muy hacendosa y optimista.Se dedica a la venta de bebidas y regalos, mercadería que ofrece en todos los matrimonios de su pueblo natal, Macari, trabajo con el que gracias a su empeño e iniciativa, hace dos años le viene otorgando resultados muy favorables permitiéndole así mejorar su situación económica familiar.Mientras ella desempeña este trabajo, su esposo, Leonardo, presta servicios de movilidad rural de Macará a Ayaviri, en su pequeño ómnibus que adquirieron con mucho esfuerzo. Entre los dos buscan ofrecerle bienestar y educación a sus cinco hijos menores.Cleofe desea aumentar el stock de su mercadería y para llevar a cabo este proyecto requiere obtener un préstamo.Ayudemos a concretar los planes de Cleofe, ella espera por tu favorable respuesta.

loans.use: Buying a larger quantity of merchandise for her small store (Compra de mayor cantidad de artículos para su pequeña tienda.)

loans.name: Hernán

texts.es:
In the cheese plant in the rural community of Macarí Ayaviri, we find Hernán skillfully and diligently making his delicious and incomparable cheeses. He inherited this work from his beloved parents and now performs the job with supreme professionalism and dedication. Thanks to this, his delicious and recognized product is in great demand. The wish of this hard-working and vigorous father of two children is to purchase forage to keep feeding his generous cows that for a long time have been giving him great satisfaction for the large quantity of milk that they provide him daily. In order to realize these plans, he would like to obtain a loan, money that thanks to your generous contribution will be well-invested in the hands of this hard-working father.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva volunteer.

En la planta quesera de la comunidad campesina de Macarí-Ayaviri, encontramos a Hernán realizando muy hábil y empeñosamente sus deliciosos e incomparables quesos, labor que heredó de sus queridos padres y que ahora desempeña con sumo profesionalismo y dedicación, gracias a eso, su delicioso y reconocido producto esta obteniendo muy buena demanda. El deseo de este laborioso y vigoroso padre de dos niños, es adquirir forraje para seguir alimentando a sus generosas vaquitas que desde hace un buen tiempo atrás le vienen dando mucha satisfacción, por la gran cantidad de leche que diariamente le otorgan. Para concretar sus planes desea obtener un préstamo, dinero que gracias a tu generoso aporte será muy bien invertido en las manos de este hacendoso padre.

loans.use: Purchase forage for cows

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es:
The small clothing business that Isidora runs brings her immense joy and satisfaction, and fills her with optimism to carry on and try to obtain greater benefits from it. Isidora regularly begins her day at 5 in the morning, when she tends to her 5 children so that they can go to school and receive an education. After fulfilling her role as a mother, she immediately tends to the sale of her novel clothing garments which, thanks to her efforts and dedication, has generated a good income. The wish of this hard-working mother is to increase the variety of her merchandise, especially because of the upcoming holiday season when her merchandise will be in high demand. Isidora hopefully waits for your favorable response.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

El pequeño negocio de venta de ropas que tiene doña Isidora le esta proporcionando inmenso placer y satisfacción, al mismo tiempo la llena de optimismo para seguir adelante y tratar de sacar el máximo provecho a este negocio.Doña Isidora, empieza su día cotidiano a las 5:00 de la mañana, hora en la que atiende a sus cinco hijos para que estos vayan a la escuela y reciban educación, luego de cumplir sus funciones de madre, inmediatamente se dedica a la venta de sus novedosas prendas de vestir, negocio que gracias a su empeño y dedicación le va generando buenos ingresos económicos.El deseo de esta laboriosa madre es aumentar la variedad de su mercadería, más aún por esta época de navidad y año nuevo en donde su mercadería tendrá gran demanda.Isidora espera ilusionada por tu favorable respuesta.

loans.use: Increase capital to purchase a greater variety of clothing.

loans.name: Manuela Giovanni

texts.es:
Manuela Giovanni, 31, has 3 children who still depend on her. She lives in the Peruvian "departamento" of La Libertad. This hard-working and determined woman has a shop in her house that sells everything: groceries, medicines, beer, gas, etc. From 6:00 in the evening, she sets out with her food cart to sell all kinds of prepared food: hamburgers, salchipollos and fried chicken.

Manuela only finished three years of secondary school because there was no money for her to continue but she's forged ahead anyway, setting up her business and buying land to build a house. She's very pleased with what she's accomplished and to be a member of the Jerusalen ("Jerusalem") Grupo Mientras Tanto (a "Grupo Mientras Tanto" is an interim group of borrowers not large enough to form a community bank) from which she received her first loan of S/.300 (300 Peruvian soles or about US$100), money that she used to buy a sack of rice, a sack of sugar and other inventory. The recently-granted loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.400 (about US$134), to be repaid in 4 months, will be used to buy a food cart.

Manuela dreams of finishing her house and, above all, having her own minimarket.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Manuela Giovanni a sus 31 años de edad tiene 3 hijos los cuales aún dependen de ella; vive en el Sector Nuevo Jerusalén del Distrito de La Esperanza de la Provincia de Trujillo Departamento de La Libertad. La señora Manuela es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa tiene una tienda en su casa en la que vende de todo: abarrotes, medicina, cerveza, gas, etc. a partir de la 6:00 de la tarde saca su carrito sanguchero para vender todo tipo de hamburguesas, salchipollo y pollo frito (comida rápida).

Estudió sólo hasta el tercer año de secundaria porque no contó con mas apoyo para seguir estudiando, pero aún así ha salido adelante ha implementar su negocio y ha comprado un terreno para construir su casa. Está muy contenta con lo que ha logrado y también de ser socia del Grupo Mientras Tanto “Jerusalén”, en este grupo obtuvo su primer préstamo de S/.300.00 (aproximadamente $100) que le sirvió para comprar un saco de arroz, un saco de azúcar y otros abarrotes. El reciente préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/.400.00 (aproximadamente $134) el cual será pagado en 4 meses, lo utilizará para comprar un carrito sanguchero (activo).

La señora Manuela sueña con terminar de construir su casa y sobretodo anhela mucho tener un minimarket.

loans.use: Buy a food cart.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz Mabel, 20 years old, is a cheerful and entrepreneurial young lady with innumerable plans and projects for her future. Despite her scarce financial resources, she decided to push herself and study a professional career in accounting in a very prestigious university in her city. In an effort to cover expenses from her university studies, she found a way to obtain an income selling cosmetics which, thanks to her persuasive skills and the popularity of her products, she offers to friends, teachers and classmates, obtaining optimal results. This young entrepreneur’s wish is to increase her investment capital, and for this she resorts to your gracious support. She is requesting a loan so that after its investment, she can accomplish her goal of one day becoming a professional and developing efficiently in her career.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Liz Mabel de 20 años de edad, es una alegre y emprendedora muchacha con innumerables planes y proyectos para su vida futura, pese a sus bajos recursos económicos, decidió esforzarse y estudiar la carrera profesional de contabilidad en una universidad muy prestigiosa de su ciudad.Para cubrir de algún modo sus gastos de estudios superiores encontró la manera de obtener ingresos económicos, vendiendo cosméticos, producto que gracias a la popularidad que tiene y a su don de persuasión le está permitiendo ofrecer y vender a sus amistades, docentes y compañeras de su centro de estudio, obteniendo resultados muy óptimos.El deseo que tiene esta emprendedora es aumentar su capital de inversión y para esto recurre a tu gentil apoyo y hace la solicitud de un préstamo que luego de su inversión le permitirá cumplir con su anhelo de ser algún día profesional y desempeñarse eficientemente en su carrera.

loans.use: Increase her capital to purchase a greater quantity and variety of beauty products.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Located inside the Túpac Amaru market of the city of Juliaca is Olga’s toy and stuffed animal stand. She is the mother of three charming children. She tends to her small establishment from 6 in the morning until 8 in the evening. In this opportunity, she would like to request a loan to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity and variety of products, which are currently in great demand by the entire population due to the holiday season. With the income she incurs after the sale of her merchandise, she hopes to save enough to open a wholesale grocery store. This establishment would be run by her husband, Salomón. With these two businesses they hope to offer their loving children an education and well-being. With their efforts, perseverance and our vital support, Olga can make her dreams a reality.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Dentro del mercado Túpac Amaru de la ciudad de Juliaca, está ubicado el puesto de venta de juguetes y peluches de la señora Olga, madre de tres encantadores niños.Ella atiende su pequeño establecimiento desde las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, en esta oportunidad desea obtener un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de productos, que por ésta época navideña están siendo muy demandadas por toda la población.Con los beneficios económicos que obtenga, luego de la comercialización de su mercadería, desea ahorrar lo suficiente para abrir una tiendita de abarrotes al por mayor, establecimiento en el que pretende atender su esposo, Salomón, y así con estos dos oficios ofrecerles bienestar y educación a sus queridos hijos.Con su esfuerzo, perseverancia y vuestro importante aporte doña Olga podrá cumplir sus sueños.

loans.use: Purchase  a greater quantity and variety of products for her toy stand.

loans.name: Corina

texts.es:
Corina is a hardworking, separated single mother. Since she took responsibility of her five underage children on her own, necessity has led her to face a tougher world. She has tried different activities to make a living and offer security and education to her little children. She presently delivers meals to local merchants at the San José market of her hometown Juliaca. Thanks to her popularity and delicious food, she has gained numerous clients. The good results she has achieved in this activity motivate her to better herself and ensure the well-being of her children, keeping alive the hope of one day having her own country house, where she would be able to offer a variety of tasty dishes and delight her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

Corina es madre separada y muy laboriosa. Desde que se hizo cargo sola de sus cinco hijos menores, la necesidad y su familia, la llevaron a enfrentarse a un mundo más duro. Desde entonces buscó desarrollar diferentes actividades para ganarse la vida y así ofrecerles seguridad y educación a sus pequeños retoños. Actualmente se dedica a repartir almuerzos en viandas a los comerciantes del mercado San José de su ciudad natal, Juliaca, oficio que gracias a su popularidad y deliciosos potajes va obteniendo muchísimos comensales. Este trabajo que desempeña le va generando buenos resultados, hecho que la motiva mucho más a salir adelante y tratar de ofrecer bienestar a sus hijos, sin perder las esperanzas de algún día poseer su propia quinta, lugar donde pueda ofrecer variedad de platos y así deleitar con sus deliciosos potajes a sus clientes.

loans.use: Purchase of consumables to prepare her delicious meals.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
One block away from the train terminal of the city of Juliaca, we find Delia selling a wide variety of fresh vegetables to her neighbors. She is the mother of two children, ages 3 and 7. Since she married Nicasio, who works as a chauffeur in a rural transport company, she always dreamed of owning her own house and offering her children a safe haven where they could play freely. Now, with great effort and sacrifice, that dream is finally about to materialize.

Delia’s wish is to increase the variety of her merchandise and expand her vegetable stand. To do that, she is requesting a loan which after its appropriate investment will generate greater revenue to finally attain her much-desired goal. With your generous support, Delia and her family will very soon enjoy having a home of their own where they will be safe and sound.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

A una cuadra del terminal terrestre de la ciudad de Juliaca encontramos a Delia, vendiendo gran variedad y frescas verduras a sus vecinos. Ella es madre de dos niños de 7 y 3 años de edad, desde que se casó con Nicasio, quien trabaja como chofer en una empresa se transporte rural, siempre tuvo el sueño de poseer su propia casita y ofrecerles un techo propio y seguro en donde puedan jugar libremente sus hijos, ahora finalmente ese sueño con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio esta apunto de concretarse.El deseo de Delia es aumentar la variedad de mercadería y ampliar su puesto de venta, para eso solicita obtener un préstamo que luego de su correcta inversión le proporcionará mayores ingresos económicos, para finalmente concretar su tan anhelado propósito.“Con tu generoso aporte Delia y su familia dentro de poco tiempo gozarán de un techo propio y seguro”

loans.use: Increase her investment capital to offer a greater variety and quantity of vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
Rosario is a cheerful and loving mother. She is a native of the city of Lima, but decided to reside in Juliaca for family reasons. Since she separated from her husband, she has looked for a way to bring up her 11-year-old daughter, Valeria, successfully. To do this, she decided to sell second-hand wallets, select merchandise that she brings from the city of La Paz, and offers them to her friends, neighbors and a large amount of clients. Additionally, she creates beautiful handicrafts which she hopes to continue working on with greater strength and intensity until she can open a large store. To materialize her plans Rosario is requesting this loan, which thanks to your generous heart she will be able to invest in her new project.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Rosario, es una alegre y amorosa madre, es natural de la ciudad de Lima pero por cuestiones familiares decidió radicar en Juliaca. Desde que se separó de su esposo buscó la manera de sacar adelante a su hija Valeria de 11 años de edad, para esto decidió dedicarse a la venta de carteras de segundo uso, mercadería selecta que trae de la ciudad de la Paz y los va ofreciendo a sus amistades, vecinos y gran cantidad de clientes, adicionalmente realiza hermosos trabajos manuales, labor al que desea dedicarse con mayor fuerza y ahínco, hasta lograr tener una gran tienda de manualidades.Para concretar sus planes Rosario solicita un préstamo, que gracias a tu generoso corazón podrá invertirlos en su nuevo proyecto.

loans.use: Purchase capital for the production of her handicrafts.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
In one of the busiest markets in the city of Juliaca we find Nancy, a young 28-year-old entrepreneur, who since she was very little felt a special attachment to the kitchen. For that reason she decided to set up her own restaurant 5 years ago which initially resulted profitable, but with the passing of time the competition in the market grew stronger and she decided to change activities. Currently, she works selling ceviche, another of Nancy’s well-respected specialties, selling approximately 200 plates daily. She feels very happy and satisfied with the favorable results she has obtained in such a short period of time.

Nancy’s wish is to further increase the number of plates she sells each day. She has been considering buying another tricycle cart and sell her delicious ceviche in front of the university to please the students with her tasteful dishes. Let’s support Nancy so that she may continue working with the same intensity and can accomplish her goals in a very short time.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

En uno de los mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de Juliaca encontramos a Nancy, joven emprendedora de 28 años de edad, que desde muy pequeña sintió un especial apego a la cocina, es por esa razón que hace cinco años decidió poner su restaurante, negocio que en un principio le resultaba rentable, pero conforme pasaba el tiempo la competencia en el mercado era más fuerte y decidió cambiar de actividad.Actualmente se dedica a la venta de ceviche, otra de las especialidades muy respetadas de Nancy, vendiendo diariamente alrededor de 200 platos, sintiéndose muy contenta y satisfecha por los resultados favorables que en muy corto tiempo está obteniendo.El deseo que tiene Nancy es incrementar aún más la cantidad de platos que ofrece y tiene pensado comprar otro triciclo y vender también sus deliciosos ceviches al frente de la universidad, y así deleitar con sus agradables platillos a los estudiantes.“Apoyemos para que Nancy siga trabajando con el mismo ahínco y pueda cumplir en muy corto tiempo su propósito”.

loans.use: Purchase a tricycle cart and increase capital needed for the preparation of her ceviche plates.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.es:
Ninfa, 52, is a mother and is separated from her husband. With much effort and dedication she has succeeded in motivating her two children, and thanks to her commitment they are now professionals and independent. Her business in the sale of beverages (sodas, juices and beer) gave her the opportunity to make ends meet and offer her children well-being while they were still in her home.

Ninfa’s wish is to prosper with her small establishment and is requesting a loan to expand and implement her premises. Ninfa promises to repay the loan in a 6-month term and thanks you in advance for your kind collaboration.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Ninfa D. 52 años D. edad, es madre separada, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado impulsar a sus dos hijos y gracias a su empeño ellos son independientes y profesionales.Su actividad D. venta D. bebidas (gaseosas, jugos y cervezas), le dió la oportunidad D. salir adelante y ofrecerles bienestar a sus hijos menores mientras estaban en su seno familiar.El deseo D. doña Ninfa es prosperar con su pequeño establecimiento y solicita un préstamo para ampliar e implementar sus instalaciones.Doña Ninfa se compromete en reembolsarles el préstamo en un lapso D. seis meses y agradece anticipadamente tu gentil colaboración.

loans.use: Expansion and implementation of her business establishment.

loans.name: Candy

texts.es:
Candy is a young 19-year-old mother. Her partner abandoned her after finding out she was pregnant. Fortunately, she received support from her dear aunt, Margarita. Since then, she immediately began working to cover her expenses and those of her young offspring. For two years now, which is her daughter’s age, she has been selling towels and undergarments for men, women and children in a small stand in the Túpac Amaru market in her hometown of Juliaca.

This hard-working young lady with immense motherly love begins selling her merchandise at 8 in the morning and does so until 9 in the evening, always in the company of her inseparable daughter. Candy’s wish is to increase her capital to continue investing in her merchandise which has been generating good income for her. In order to accomplish her objectives, she would like to obtain this loan and promises to be punctual and responsible with its repayment. Candy and her little daughter are in need of your help.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer.

Candy, es una joven madre de 19 años de edad, su pareja la desamparó cuando se enteró de que estaba embarazada, pero afortunadamente recibió el apoyo de su querida tía Margarita, desde entonces trabajó inmediatamente para solventar sus gastos y la de su pequeño retoño.Desde hace dos años, edad que tiene su pequeña hija se dedica a la vente de toallas y prendas interiores para niños, damas y caballeros, en un pequeño puesto del mercado Túpac Amaru de su ciudad natal, Juliaca.Esta laboriosa muchacha con inmenso amor de madre, empieza a vender su mercadería a las 8:00 de la mañana hasta las 9:00 de la noche, acompañada siempre de su inseparable hija.El deseo de Candy es aumentar su capital para seguir invirtiendo en su mercadería que le está generando buenos ingresos económicos y para cumplir sus objetivos desea obtener un préstamo, así mismo promete ser puntual y responsable con el reembolso.Candy y su pequeña niña requieren tu ayuda.

loans.use: Increase her capital to purchase undergarments in greater amounts.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.es:
Elmer is a very loving father who is worried about the wellbeing of his dear family. For four years he has worked selling natural products, which he sells as a traveling salesman in the fairs and markets of various small towns neighboring Juliaca, where he was born and currently resides. He has always put his family first, and even today is still educating and demonstrating to his children that any job can be dignified. This exemplary father’s only wish is to increase the quantity and variety of his merchandise. After proper marketing, he is trying to save some money to help his young spouse Matitza get started in the garment business. Elmer’s family awaits your assistance; please help them.

Translated from Spanish by David Hou, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

Elmer, es un padre muy amoroso y preocupado por el bienestar de su querida familia, hace cuatro años está dedicado a la venta de productos naturales, mercadería que ofrece en forma ambulatoria en las ferias de los diferentes pueblitos limítrofes de su ciudad natal, Juliaca.Ella siempre ha buscado sacar adelante a su familia y hasta la fecha lo está logrando dándoles educación y demostrándoles que cualquier trabajo es dignificante. El deseo de este ejemplar padre es aumentar la cantidad y variedad de su mercadería, después de su debida comercialización tratar de ahorrar cierto capital para apoyar a su joven esposa, Matitza, a incursionar en el negocio de venta de prendas de vestir.La familia de Elmer espera por ti, ayúdalos.

loans.use: Increase of capital to offer a greater variety of natural products.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.es:
Violeta is a cheerful and responsible young woman of 20 years of age. Ever since she was young, she has been interested in handcraft and artwork. With the help of Adelida, her 48 year old mother, Violeta has help and performed a wide variety of jobs and currently works to create flower arrangements for livestock fair prizes. She fulfills this job with the utmost care and dedication. Thanks to these characteristics, Violeta has a large demand for her goods. Violeta’s wish is to have a shop for handcraft and small manual jobs. In order to fulfill these plans, she is asking for a loan. Let us help this enthusiastic young woman to get ahead and prosper.

Translated from Spanish by David Hou, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

Violeta es una alegre y responsable muchachita de 20 años de edad, desde pequeña se interesó por el trabajo artesanal y manual, ella con apoyo de su madre Adelida de 48 años de edad, realiza una inmensa variedad de trabajos y por esta temporada está confeccionando escarapelas para las premiaciones de las ferias ganaderas, oficio que desempeña con sumo cuidado y dedicación y gracias a estas características tiene gran cantidad de solicitudes.El deseo de Violeta y su madre es tener una tienda de trabajos manuales y para concretar sus planes solicita obtener un préstamo.“Apoyemos a esta entusiasta muchacha a salir adelante y prosperar ”

loans.use: Increase of capital to quickly open her handcraft shop.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela is 22 years old and is the younger daughter of Adela, an exemplary mother. More than 13 years ago, her father deserted the family, causing her much pain and disappointment. Since then, her enterprising and determined mother has been working in different jobs in order to provide for the family. Thanks to Adela’s sacrifice, her two older daughters are working successfully in the professional world. Currently, Estela and her mother work creating beautiful and novel stuffed toys, a job that, thanks to their agility and creativity, is generating tremendous demand on the markets of Arequipa, Cuzco and Puno. This business allows Estela and her mother to satisfactorily cover the costs of their house and Estela’s higher education. In order to better meet these growing demands, they turn to you for your generous support and ask for a loan. This enterprising and hardworking family anxiously awaits your response.

Translated from Spanish by David Hou, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

Estela de 22 años de edad, es hija menor de Adela madre ejemplar y muy valiosa. Hace más de trece años sufrió el abandono de su padre, hecho que le causó mucho dolor y decepción, desde entonces su emprendedora y luchadora madre siempre trabajó en diferentes oficios para tratar de sacarla adelante, gracias a su sacrificio sus dos hermanos mayores son profesionales y exitosos.Actualmente Estela y su querida e incomparable madre se dedican a realizar hermosos y novedosos peluches, trabajos que gracias a su agilidad y creatividad están acrecentando y obteniendo gran cantidad de solicitudes en los mercados de los departamentos de Arequipa, Cuzco y Puno, permitiéndole así cubrir satisfactoriamente los gastos de su hogar y estudios superiores.Para cumplir sus solicitudes recurre a tu generoso apoyo y hace la petición de un préstamo. Esta emprendedora y laboriosa familia espera ansiosa por tu favorable respuesta.

loans.use: Increase of capital to make a greater quantity of stuffed toys.

loans.name: Lili Rosa

texts.es:
Ms. Rosita is very well known within the Túpac Amaru market. For two years, she has dedicated herself to the sale of alfalfa. In addition to this labor, Rosita also sells candy, cookies and sodas in a small market stand. Some time ago, her husband and father to her five children abandoned the family. Since then, Rosita has found a way to support her family and keep her children going. Currently, four of her children work and are independent. The only one remaining at her siD. is her 26 year old daughter Séfora, who offers mobile calls to the population. Rosita’s wish is to obtain a loan to buy “panetones” to satisfy the large demand due to the arrival of the holiday season. With the profits she obtains, she can improve her economic situation. Rosita confides in you. Help her and she will not let you down.

Translated from Spanish by David Hou, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

Doña Rosita es muy popular dentro del mercado Túpac Amaru. DesD. hace dos años se dedica a la venta D. alfalfa, adicionalmente a esta labor venD. golosinas, galletas y gaseosas en un pequeño puestito que tienen dentro del mercado, desD. que el padre D. sus cinco hijos los abandonó ha buscado la manera D. impulsar y sacar adelante a sus pequeños retoños. Actualmente cuatro D. ellos trabajan y son independientes, quedando sólo con su hija menor Séfora D. 26 años D. edad quien trabaja brindando servicios D. llamadas móviles a la población.El deseo D. Rosita es obtener un préstamo para comprar panetones ya que en esta época D. festividades tienen gran demanda y con los beneficios que consiga mejorar su situación económica. Rosita confía en ti, apóyala no te defraudará.

loans.use: Purchase of "panetones" to sell to the general public during the holiday season.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria del Pilar’s entire family is in the grain harvesting and processing business, but each person also spends some time each year doing other activities. Upon seeing that she could obtain good results, Maria del Pilar, along with the help of her mother, has decided to open a small processing factory for cereals. Recently, they have become one of the most important providers for the shops and vegetarian restaurants of the city of Juliaca. This young businesswoman’s wish is to have a great processing plant for cereals and Andean grain. For the moment, she wishes to obtain a loan to buy primary material to process their heavily demanded products. Let us help this young businesswoman prosper with her new project.

Translated from Spanish by David Hou, Princeton University Language Project volunteer.

Toda la familia de Maria del Pilar, estuvo dedicada a la transformación de granos, pero conforme pasaban los años cada uno dispuso realizar otras actividades ajenas a esta labor. Al ver que podía obtener buenos resultados, Maria del Pilar con apoyo de su madre con mucho empeño y diligencia decidió implementar su pequeña fábrica de transformación de granos andinos (cereales), actualmente se están convirtiendo en los proveedores más importantes de las tiendas y restaurantes vegetarianos de la ciudad de Juliaca.El deseo de esta joven empresaria es tener una gran planta de procesamiento de cereales y granos andinos y por el momento desea obtener un préstamo para comprar materia prima para procesar sus productos tan demandados.Apoyemos a esta joven empresaria a prosperar con su nuevo proyecto.

loans.use: Increase of capital to meet the demand for her products.

loans.name: Marisela

texts.es:
Marisela is from the city of Arequipa, but her family is from Juliaca. She comes from a humble family, but her desire to succeed in life superseded her economic condition. At an early age she learned to make new and different articles of clothing. Thanks to her excellent work she won the admiration and loyalty of her clients. With the benefits she obtained she was able to pay for her advanced obstetrician studies, and those of her husband Rómulo. Both are now parents of two charming girls and the wish of this hard-working mother is to build her house on the property that she bought with high hopes. In order to realize her plans for which she works hard, Marisela appeals to your caring heart and requests a loan to buy the materials necessary to continue making her fine articles of clothing. Let’s support this excellent seamstress so she can continue sewing her elegant and distinguished articles of clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva volunteer.

Marisela es natural de la ciudad de Arequipa, pero por cuestiones familiares radica en Juliaca, proviene de una familia humilde pero sus ganas de triunfar en la vida pudieron más que su condición económica. Desde muy jovencita aprendió a confeccionar diferentes y novedosas prendas de vestir, gracias a su excelente labor se ganó la admiración y el buen gusto de sus clientes y con los beneficios que obtenía pudo pagar sus estudios superiores de obstetra y los de su esposo Rómulo. Ambos actualmente son padres de dos encantadoras niñas y el deseo de esta luchadora madre es construir su casita en la propiedad que muy ilusionadamente adquirió, para concretar sus planes cada cual se esfuerza en sus oficios, es por eso que doña Marisela recurre tu solidario corazón y hace la petición de un préstamo para comprar los materiales necesarios a fin de seguir confeccionando sus finas prendas de vestir. Apoyemos a esta excelente costurera para que siga confeccionando sus elegantes y distinguidas prendas de vestir.

loans.use: Buy a greater quantity of raw materials

loans.name: Hortensia

texts.es:
More than twenty years ago, Hortensia and her five children suffered the abandonment and physical mistreatment from their father and husband. Since then, with a lot of determination, good example, education, and love, this humble mother has been giving well-being and security to her children. She has dedicated herself to diverse activities such as: selling fruits and vegetables, running a small school-supply store, selling potatoes and groceries as a street vendor, etc. Finally, after being able to save a little money, she decided to begin selling kerosene and gasoline. For this she rented a small establishment with the goal of keeping her merchandise in a safe place. This traD. has allowed her to give her five children well-being. Four of her children are independent, and their family is strong. She still cares for her youngest son, Adrián, with whom she works tirelessly in order to move forward. This industrious mother wishes to have more capital to invest in her business and in order to realize these plans, she is requesting a loan. Hortensia awaits your support.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva volunteer.

Hace más D. veinte años, Hortensia y sus cinco hijos sufrieron el abandono y maltrato físico D. su padre y esposo, desD. entonces con mucho empeño, buen ejemplo, educación y amor esta humilD. madre fue otorgándoles bienestar y seguridad a sus hijos, dedicándose a diversas actividades como: la venta D. frutas y verduras, tiendita escolar, venta D. papas y abarrotes en forma ambulatoria etc. Finalmente, después D. contar con un ahorrito decidió dedicarse a la venta D. kerosene y gasolina, para esto alquiló un pequeño establecimiento, con el fin D. tener segura y a buen recaudo su mercadería. Este oficio le ha permitido brindarles bienestar a sus cinco hijos, ahora cuatro D. ellos ya son independientes con una familia bien consolidada, quedando a cargo D. su hijo menor Adrián con quien trabaja arduamente para salir adelante. El deseo D. esta hacendosa madre es contar con más capital para invertirlos en su negocio y para concretar sus planes hace la solicitud D. un préstamo. Hortensia aguarda tu apoyo.

loans.use: Increase capital in order to acquire a greater quantity of fuel

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet is a woman of immense strength. Driven by her love for her children, she works tirelessly day after day to give them a good future. She occupies her time attending her little store and at night she sells kebabs. She began this most recent venture when an opportunity presented itself to care for a neighbor’s house during his absence. In this way she was motivated to open her store. It’s already been four years since then, and Yanet is satisfied for having obtained economic stability and loyal clients who assure her earnings. Nonetheless, all these efforts she’s undertaken are still not sufficient to cover her fifteen-year old daughter’s costly medical treatment. As a result of this, her desire to grow her business has been notably prioritized. She requests the support of your noble hearts in order to increase the quantity of products in her small store. Contribute to building Yanet’s future with diligence and through Yanet, a hard-working and strong mother.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva volunteer.

Yanet, es una mujer de una fuerza inmensa, impulsada por el amor de sus hijos, día a día trabaja incansablemente por otorgarles un buen futuro. Se desempeña atendiendo su pequeña tienda y en las noches vende salchipapas; esta última iniciativa la tuvo cuando se presentó la oportunidad de un vecino que le ofreció su casa para que la cuide durante su ausencia; es así que se animó a abrir su tienda. Ya han transcurrido 4 años desde entonces y Yanet está satisfecha de haber conseguido estabilidad económica y de poseer clientes fieles que aseguran las ganancias; sin embargo aún todos los esfuerzos que otorga no son suficientes para cubrir el costoso tratamiento médico de su pequeña de quince años. A raíz de este hecho sus deseos por acrecentar el pequeño negocio se han priorizado notablemente y solicita el apoyo de vuestro noble corazón para incrementar la cantidad de productos de su pequeña tienda. Contribuye a que el futuro sea construido con diligencia y a través de Yanet una madre trabajadora y esforzada.

loans.use: Increase capital in order to acquire a greater quantity of items of utmost importance

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.es:
Aquilina has always been devoted to work and thus acquired a useful piece of knowledge, that she now applies to her life and teaches to her children as well. With great diligence and creativity, she has seeked the way to create businesses and provide services that have helped her advance in life. When she was young, she used to travel to different cities to sell several items, such as clothes and cosmetics. When she got married, she had to stay at home, so she decided to offer her products to her neighbors. When her husband died, the need became pressing and pushed her into a worrying financial crisis, as she was burdened with the responsibility of providing for her little children on her own. In spite of this situation, she continued performing different crafts, as opportunities presented themselves. She was often forced to accept work that required great physical effort. After putting up a tough fight, Aquilina is satisfied to see her children have become people who can stand for themselves and face critical situations of need. She presently lives with only two of her daughters, both single mothers. The wish of this hardworking mother, who spends long hours doing laundry for her clients, is to acquire a laundry machine, in order to reduce the physical effort and soon be able to open a laundry to offer services to the whole community.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

Aquilina siempre ha estado dedicada al trabajo y adquirió una enseñanza de valor que ahora aplica en su vida misma e impulsó a que aprendan sus hijos; así, con mucha diligencia y creatividad, busca la forma de crear negocios y servicios que la ayudan a sobresalir. Desde su juventud viajaba a distintas ciudades para vender diferentes artículos tales como prendas de vestir, cosméticos, etc. Cuando se casó ya no pudo dedicarse a este negocio de la misma manera, por lo que decidió ofertarlos a sus vecinas; sin embargo, la necesidad fue aún más apremiante cuando su esposo falleció y tenía la responsabilidad de velar por sus pequeños, ahora sin ayuda y compañía. Este hecho la condujo a una crisis económica muy preocupante; a pesar de ello, siguió ocupándose en diversos oficios y labores según se presentaban las oportunidades, aceptando muchas veces trabajos que requerían gran esfuerzo físico. Aquilina, después de su ardua lucha, puede ver con satisfacción a sus hijos convertidos en personas que pueden valerse por si mismos y preparados para enfrentar situaciones críticas de escasez. Hoy sólo vive con dos de sus hijas, que son madres solteras. El deseo de esta trabajadora madre, que dedica interminables horas a lavar las prendas y frazadas de otras personas, es adquirir una lavadora a fin de aminorar su esfuerzo y pronto establecer una lavandería para ofrecer sus servicios a su comunidad entera.

loans.use: Purchase of a laundry machine.

loans.name: Angela Marlene

texts.es:
Angela Marlene, 45, is a kindergarden teacher in the Peruvian "departamento" of La Libertad. At the same time, she runs a business selling all kinds of clothes. Her customers are the mothers of the children at the school where she teaches and her neighbors who continually place orders with her. She also makes lunches for some of the kindergarden's students. She used to make pillows, buying beading and whatever else helped to sell them. Loans from her community bank has helped her to expand her business.

Angela is a member of the Mujeres Valerosas ("Courageous Women") community bank from which she received her first loan of S/.300 (300 Peruvian soles or about US$100). With that money, she traveled to Lima to buy clothes (to fill orders placed by her customers) and also to buy school supplies as the loan was received in the middle of the school year. With the most recent loan from Manuela Ramos of S/.800 (about US$268), to be repaid in 4 months, she will be able to go to Lima to buy toys which she will sell over the Christmas season.

Angela has a goal in mind: complete the construction of her house.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La señora Ángela Marlene tiene 45 años, es profesora de inicial de un jardín del sector Bellavista en el distrito de La Esperanza Provincia de Trujillo departamento de La Libertad. Paralelamente se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa, sus clientes son las madres de familia del jardín donde enseña y sus vecinos le hacen pedidos continuamente, además prepara la lonchera para algunos niños de este jardín. La señora Ángela antes hacía almohadones, compraba ganchitos y todo lo que es mecería para vender; con los préstamos recibidos en su Banco Comunal ha ampliado su negocio.

La señora Ángela es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Valerosas”, en él ha obtenido su primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 (aproximadamente $100), con este dinero viajó a Lima para comprar ropa (según pedidos de sus clientes) y también compró útiles escolares ya que el préstamo lo recibió en plena campaña escolar. Con el reciente préstamo obtenido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 800.00 (aproximadamente $268), el cual será cancelado en 4 meses, podrá viajar a Lima a comprar juguetes, los que venderá en la campaña navideña.

La señora Ángela tiene un objetivo en mente: terminar de construir su casa.

loans.use: Compra de juguetes.

loans.name: Faalelei

texts.en: Faalelei is a lady of forty-one years of age, married with four children. She is very good at making handicrafts such earrings, rings, hats and mats in different styles and in Samoan style. She applied for this loan in order to buy everything she needs for her business, but some of it will be used to build her family a European-style bathroom. She is very happy to be able to support her family and improve her home.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her handicrafts business and for home improvements

loans.name: Telesia Fa

texts.en:
Telesia is a lady of twenty five years of age, married with a son. She applied for her loan in order to buy all the ingredients (especially meats) for running her barbecue business. She sells beside the main road of her village three days per week, and she earns $260ST($104USD) per day.

She said that her business helps with her family needs, especially for her kids--all because of the loan she got from this program, because without it she could not run her business. She’s very happy to continue in the future and get more loans from the SPBD program.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and supplies for her barbecue

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Increase the capital for her work

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Supplies for her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a wider variety of merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy tables, chairs and kitchen utensils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothing accessories

payments.comment: Client has fallen short of full payment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Salon renovation and purchase of beauty products.

loans.name: Parade Tani Group

texts.id:
This group of 10 men are farmers, and each of them have 0.1 hectares of paddy field. They run this 0.1 hectares they would need quite a lot of capital because they need to prepare seeds, seedlings, fertilizer, insecticide and and to pay worker's salary as well. They hire workers to level the field by using water buffaloes or tractors. Then the workers will plant the seedlings and clear off any wild plants. This group of men are from the same tribe and area, which allowed to help each other out. Their wishes are to let their children to have better education, and a better economy.

Translated from Bahasa by Maria Hernandez, Kiva volunteer.

Kelompok ini beranggotakan 10 orang yang kesemuanya adalah para petani. Mereka mengusahakan tanah mereka dengan menanam padi dan rata-rata setiap petani mempunyai lahan 10 are. Di tanah yang 10 are ini para petani membutuhkan modal yang tidak sedikit karena mereka harus menyiapkan pupuk sekitar 100 kilogram, bibit sebanyak 5 kilogram, obat-obatan untuk hama, biaya perawatan dan jasa para pekerja. Para petani membutuhkan tenaga pembantu seperti buruh traktor untuk membajak tanah baik itu menggunakan tenaga tradisional (sapi, kerbau) ataupun menggunakan tenaga mesin (traktor), pekerja untuk menanam bibit padi, membersihkan gulma (tanaman liar) serta para pekerja untuk memanen padi tersebut. Kelompok ini terdiri dari para kaum bapak yang ada di satu dusun atau satu desa yang tentunya tempatnya berdekatan sehingga memudahkan bagi mereka untuk saling mengontrol satu dengan yang lainnya. Harapan-harapan mereka tentunya dapat menyekolahkan anaknya lebih baik lagi, keadaan ekonomi akan lebih meningkat sehingga keluarga mereka akan semakin baik dikemudian hari.

loans.use: To buy Seedlings , fertilizer, insecticide and other agriculture necessities.

loans.name: Normawati

texts.id:
Normawati's profession is selling Chicken noodle soup. Her daily activities includes buying materials to make chicken noodle soup in Badung market. Materials she bought includes raw noodles, green vegetables, chicken meat, and spices to make chicken noodle soup. Normawati sells chicken noodles using a push-cart, that she push around the city. Normawati rents a room in Drupadi street, Denpasar, since she does not have her own home. She hopes that one day she could save enough money to buy her own home.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Gwan Liong Ang, Kiva volunteer.

Normawati berprofesi sebagai penjual Mie Ayam, setiaphari aktifitasnya adalah membeli bahan-bahan untuk membuat mie ayam dipasar badung. Bahan-bahan yang dibelinya adalah mie mentah, sayur hijau, daging ayam dan bumbu-bumbu yang dibutuhkan untuk membuat mie ayam. Normawati menjual mie ayam dengan memakai rombong (sejenis gerobak yang dipakai oleh para pedagang mie) yang bisa didorong dan dibawa berkeling. Normawati mengontrak sebuah kamar dijalan Drupadi Denpasar karena belum mempunyai tempat tinggal sendiri, dia berharap bahwa suatu hari kelak dia dapat mengumpulkan uang untuk bisa membeli rumah sendiri.

loans.use:
To buy food materials

Untuk membeli bahan makanan

loans.name: Elen

texts.id:
Elem S. is a light Food and drinks seller, who offered them at her house on Drupadi street, Denpasar. Elem S. rented land, on which she and her husband build a very simple hut, where they live together. To help her husband to fulfill daily family expenses, Elem S. sells light food and drinks. With the capital obtained from Dinari, Ms. S. hopes to expand her business in selling food and drinks to fulfill daily family needs, and of course also to save for their future own home.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Gwan Liong Ang, Kiva volunteer.

Elem S. adalah penjual makanan dan minuman ringan yang dijajakan dirumahnya di jalan Drupadi Denpasar. Elem S. mengontrak tanah yang kemudian dibangun rumah yang sangat sederhana untuk ditinggali bersama suaminya, dan untuk membantu suaminya dalam memenuhi kebutuhan keluarga mereka, Elem S. menjual makanan dan minuman ringan. Dengan mendapatkan modal yang diberikan oleh DINARI Elem S. berharap supaya bisa membantu mengembangkan usahanya dalam menjual makanan dan minuman guna memenuhi kebutuhan keluarganya serta berusaha mengumpulkan uang untuk mendapatkan rumah sendiri tentunya.

loans.use:
To buy materials for Food making

Untuk membeli bahan makanan

loans.name: Bebun P

texts.id:
Bebun J. is a Recycler. His activities includes looking around daily to find used items. Using his modified motorcycle, with a box at the back for carrying used items, Bebun goes to areas where he felt there were many used items in shopping & housing areas. Bebun also has his own customers, so that at certain locations, he could pick up the already saved items, and he only needs to do the transactions with his clients. Income obtained by Bebun from Recycling is used to pay for rent, capital and daily living expenses.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Gwan Liong Ang, Kiva volunteer.

Bebun J. adalah seorang pemulung. Aktifitasnya adalah berkeliling setiaphari untuk mencari barang-barang bekas. Dengan menggunakan sepeda motornya yang dibuatkan kotak dibagian belakang motornya sebagai tempat barang bekas, Bebun menyusuri daerah-daerah yang menurutnya banyak terdapat barang bekas yaitu dilokasi pertokoan dan juga perumahan. Bebun juga sudah mempunyai langganan sendiri sehingga ditempat-tempat tertentu dia tinggal mengambil barang yang sudah terkumpul dan dia tinggal melakukan transaksi dengan langganannya. Hasil yang Bebun peroleh dari mengumpulkan barang bekas digunakannya untuk membayar kontrakan, modal usaha dan biaya hidup setiapharinya.

loans.use:
For Capital to buy used items

Untuk modal membeli barang-barang bekas

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a nurse/midwife managing his own private facility in Vihiga in the western part of Kenya. He is 40 years old and lives with his wife and two children in Kakamega. His wife who is also a trained nurse and works at Kakamega Provincial General Hospital.

Paul trained as a nurse/midwife in 1990 and has since operated his own private clinic at Stend Kisa in Vihiga. He offers a wide range of clinical services including general curative, family planning, maternal and child health services, and also runs a pharmacy and a laboratory. Paul attributes his success to hard work, perseverance and the good reputation he has built with the locals. He requires US $1200 to enable him to purchase an additional stock of drugs and to integrate other services.

loans.use: Purchase stock of drugs and integrate other services.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi A. is the man dressed in the blue short sleeve shirt. He is 35 years old, married and father of 2 children. Since the end of his professional training, Mr Koffi has quickly opened a store of construction materials to satisfy the demans in his town. He sells things such as sheet metal, nails, iron, electrical wires etc. This business provides him with revenue. He has been a client with Fececav for 18 months and has already paid back one loan successfully. With this current loan, he wants to diversify his stock by buying other construction materials to satisfy his clients.

Translated from French by Susan Bell, Kiva Volunteer.

Koffi A. est l'homme habillé en bleu manche courte est agé de 35 ans, marié et père de 2 enfants. Depuis la fin de sa formation professionnelle Mr Koffi a vite crée un magazin de matériel de construction(tôle, clous, fer , fils electrique etcc...) afin de satisfaire la demande dans sa localité. Cette activité lui a procuré des revenus . Il est client de Fececav depuis 18 mois et a bénéficié d'un crédit qui'il remboursé avec succès. Avec le présent emprunt il veut diversifier son stock par l'achat d'autres matériels de construction pour la satisfaction de la clientèle

loans.use: purchase of construction materials to expand his store

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr:
Miss Essi B. is 26 years old, unmarried and owner of a store situated in the central market of Kpalimé. After her studies in business, she didn't wait to be hired by someone else, but launched herself into business by opening a grocery store. This store is developing rapidly today and requires additional resources to expand its' business capital. This will allow her to satisfy the needs of her clientele and increase her revenue.

Translated from French by Susan Bell, Kiva Volunteer.

Mlle Essi B. agée de 26 ans , non mariée et propriétaire d'une boutique sise au centre du marché de Kpalimé. Après ses études de commerce elle n'a pas attendu d'être employée par quelqu'un mais elle s'est lancé dans le commerce de détail par l'ouverture d'une boutique d'alimentation générale. Cette boutique se développe rappidement aujourdhui et nécéssite des ressources suplémntaire pour renforcer son fonds de roulement pour satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle et pour augmenter son revenu

loans.use: purchase of different food products to expand her store
